comment: Ultima VII: The Black Gate - Spell Data

spells.name: Create Food
spells.desc: This spell creates enough food for the mage and each member in his party to have one meal.

spells.name: Cure
spells.desc: This spell cures poison and restores a person afflicted with paralysis.

spells.name: Detect Trap
spells.desc: This spell reveals the location of all traps within sight of the mage and his party.

spells.name: Great Douse
spells.desc: This spell extinguishes all dousable items within a certain area.

spells.name: Great Ignite
spells.desc: This spell causes all flammable items within a certain area to burst into flame.

spells.name: Light
spells.desc: This spell creates a source of light that will illuminate a darkened area.

spells.name: Locate
spells.desc: This spell reveals the sextant position of the mage, even when underground.

spells.name: Awaken All
spells.desc: This spell awakens all unconscious members of the mage's party.

spells.name: Destroy Trap
spells.desc: This spell destroys any one specific trap upon which it is cast.

spells.name: Enchant
spells.desc: This spell causes arrows or bolts to become enchanted and glow blue.

spells.name: Fire Blast
spells.desc: This spell causes great jets of flame to burst forth from the mage.

spells.name: Great Light
spells.desc: This spell creates a powerful light source with a long duration.

spells.name: Mass Cure
spells.desc: This spell cures the mage and all members of his party at once.

spells.name: Protection
spells.desc: This spell makes its subject more difficult to strike in combat.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.desc: This spell allows the mage to manipulate objects without touching them.

spells.name: Wizard Eye
spells.desc: This spell allows the mage to see through walls and scout ahead.

spells.name: Curse
spells.desc: This spell makes an enemy easier to hit in combat.

spells.name: Heal
spells.desc: This spell heals half the injuries that its subject has sustained.

spells.name: Swarm
spells.desc: This spell creates a swarm of insects to attack enemies.

spells.name: Paralyze
spells.desc: This spell paralyzes an enemy in his tracks for a short period of time.

spells.name: Protect All
spells.desc: This spell protects all party members simultaneously.

spells.name: Peer
spells.desc: This spell gives the mage a look at the entire world.

spells.name: Poison
spells.desc: This spell enables a mage to poison one enemy.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.desc: This spell causes the enchanted person to fall asleep.

spells.name: Conjure
spells.desc: This spell summons a creature that will fight for the mage.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.desc: This spell strikes the target with a bolt of lightning.

spells.name: Mark
spells.desc: This spell marks a location for later recall.

spells.name: Mass Curse
spells.desc: This spell curses an entire group of enemies.

spells.name: Recall
spells.desc: This spell returns the party to a previously marked location.

spells.name: Reveal
spells.desc: This spell makes visible all things that were invisible.

spells.name: Seance
spells.desc: This spell allows communication with the dead.

spells.name: Unlock Magic
spells.desc: This spell unlocks magically locked items.

spells.name: Charm
spells.desc: This spell charms an enemy into doing the mage's bidding.

spells.name: Dance
spells.desc: This spell causes enemies to dance uncontrollably.

spells.name: Dispel Field
spells.desc: This spell can dispel any type of magical field.

spells.name: Explosion
spells.desc: This spell creates a ball of flame that explodes.

spells.name: Great Heal
spells.desc: This spell completely heals an injured person.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.desc: This spell renders the mage invisible.

spells.name: Fire Field
spells.desc: This spell creates a wall of fire.

spells.name: Mass Sleep
spells.desc: This spell puts a group of targets to sleep.

spells.name: Cause Fear
spells.desc: This spell causes enemies to flee in terror.

spells.name: Clone
spells.desc: This spell creates a duplicate of a creature.

spells.name: Fire Ring
spells.desc: This spell creates a ring of fire around enemies.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.desc: This spell creates fire at the feet of enemies.

spells.name: Magic Storm
spells.desc: This spell creates a storm of magical energy.

spells.name: Poison Field
spells.desc: This spell creates a field of poison.

spells.name: Sleep Field
spells.desc: This spell creates a field that puts enemies to sleep.

spells.name: Tremor
spells.desc: This spell creates violent tremors in the earth.

spells.name: Create Gold
spells.desc: This spell changes lead into gold nuggets.

spells.name: Death Bolt
spells.desc: This spell projects a bolt of lethal energy.

spells.name: Delayed Blast
spells.desc: This spell creates a delayed explosion.

spells.name: Energy Field
spells.desc: This spell creates an electrical field.

spells.name: Energy Mist
spells.desc: This spell creates an electrified mist.

spells.name: Mass Charm
spells.desc: This spell charms an entire group of enemies.

spells.name: Mass Might
spells.desc: This spell doubles the strength of all party members.

spells.name: Restoration
spells.desc: This spell heals all injury and dispels harmful magic.

spells.name: Armageddon
spells.desc: This spell destroys all life in the world.

spells.name: Death Vortex
spells.desc: This spell creates a deadly vortex of energy.

spells.name: Mass Death
spells.desc: This spell kills all enemies in sight instantly.

spells.name: Invisibility All
spells.desc: This spell makes the entire party invisible.

spells.name: Resurrect
spells.desc: This spell restores life to one who has died.

spells.name: Summon
spells.desc: This spell summons a powerful demon.

spells.name: Swordstrike
spells.desc: This spell creates spinning swords that attack.

spells.name: Time Stop
spells.desc: This spell stops the passage of time.
